Retrieve list of available indicators from ARAD API

arad_get_indicators.Rd

This function retrieves the complete list of available indicators from the ARAD API, optionally filtered by category or search term.

Usage

arad_get_indicators(
  api_key = NULL,
  base_url = "https://www.cnb.cz/aradb/api/v1",
  category = NULL,
  search = NULL,
  encoding = "windows-1250"
)

Arguments

api_key

API key for ARAD access. If NULL, uses ARAD_API_KEY environment variable

base_url

Base URL for the ARAD API

category

Character, filter indicators by category (optional)

search

Character, search term to filter indicators (optional)

encoding

Character encoding for the response (default "windows-1250")

Value

A data frame with available indicators and their metadata

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Get all available indicators
indicators <- arad_get_indicators()

# Search for specific indicators
spending_indicators <- arad_get_indicators(search = "spending")

# Filter by category
monetary_indicators <- arad_get_indicators(category = "monetary")
} # }
